call_for_contributions.description: This special issue seeks contributions that redefine the role of automation with innovative ideas, visionary perspectives, and critical reflections.

types_of_papers.details: Groundbreaking new ideas supported by promising initial results.
Bold, forward-looking ideas backed by strong scientific intuition.
Critical reassessments and thoughtful analyses of past research.

summary.description: This special issue will focus on radical new ideas and transformative research in the field of automated software engineering.
topics_of_interest: Radical approaches to automating software engineering tasks
Untapped potential of automation in emergent domains
Novel theoretical frameworks for automated software development
Examination of ethical implications in automated software engineering
Reimagining correctness and verification in AI-generated software
Novel approaches to uncertainty in automated software engineering
Transformative applications of large language models
Radical perspectives on software composition and integration
Disruptive ideas for automated testing and verification
